name: Boudhanath Stupa
description: One of the largest spherical stupas in Nepal, a UNESCO World Heritage Site.

name: Pashupatinath Temple
description: Sacred Hindu temple complex on the banks of the Bagmati River.

name: Thamel Market
description: Bustling tourist district full of shops, cafés & live music.

name: Swayambhunath (Monkey Temple)
description: Ancient religious complex atop a hill with panoramic city views.

name: Garden of Dreams
description: A neo-classical historical garden tucked away from the city bustle.

name: Patan Durbar Square
description: Historic palace complex in Lalitpur, known for its Newar architecture.

name: Thamel Viewpoint Cafe
description: Popular café offering rooftop views over Thamel and the Himalayas.

name: National Museum of Nepal
description: Displays Nepal’s art, culture, and natural history.

name: Garden of Dreams Teahouse
description: Charming teahouse within the peaceful Garden of Dreams.

name: Kantipath Shopping
description: Main commercial street lined with local boutiques and street vendors.
